fields.title: Census of population and housing, 1970 sources and structure of family income summary statistics

dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue:
The file contains detailed cross-classification of data on the income in 1969 of families, family members, unrelated individuals, and persons in the experienced civilian labor force according to various socioeconomic characteristics for United States metropolitan and nonmetropolitan residence.

Summaries are provided for United States, regions, divisions, and States.

The data pertain to 1969

publication.publicationCitation: Sources and Structure Family Income, Population Subject Reports (PC (2)-8A), Washington : U.S. Government Printing, 1970

fields.notesText: Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: The universe consists of families, unrelated individuals, and persons in the experienced civilian labor force. The data are based on a 5-percent sample.; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:ACCESS.CATEGORY  Notes: I;

geographicCoverage.otherGeographicCoverage: United States, Regions, Census Divisions, States
